doc.field: Walter and Naomi Rosenblum Collection of Photography and Photographic History
Walter and Naomi Rosenblum Collection of Photography and Photographic History
Series I: Naomi Rosenblum's Research Materials, Correspondence, Subject Files, and Lectures
Series I: Naomi Rosenblum's Research Materials, Correspondence, Subject Files, and Lectures

Series I contains Naomi Rosenblum's research notes, correspondence, bibliography lists, lectures, books, articles, newspaper clippings, and photographs relating to the following topics: the history of photography and women photographers, a world history of photography, social photography, Paul Strand, Alfred Stieglitz, Lewis Hine, the Photo League, and examples historical photographic techniques including prints, daguerreotypes, ambrotypes, and tintypes.
Commercially published books used by Naomi Rosenblum as research materials were removed from the collection.
